name: Mayflower
skill: Deals 3090/3690 DMG to the 2 enemies with the highest ATK.
ability: Sharply increases all allies' crit DMG when this daemon is Team Leader.
Slightly increases crit rate at the start of each wave.

additional_data.description: A spirit of a boat that carried people in search of personal liberty. When she sees an oppressed person or someone trying to hold true to their convictions she just can't stop herself from getting involved, and many people have been dragged into situations by her interfering efforts. Still, people take kindly to her because they know how serious she is. She has actually managed to help a lot of people, and will most likely continue to do so in the foreseeable future.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "Thanksgiving Day Beatdown" Event: Clear Chapter 5
◦ "Thanksgiving Day Beatdown" Event: Exchange for 5000 Seed of Thanks
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦ Moderately increases the drop rate of Seed of Thanks during the "Thanksgiving Day Beatdown" event.

skill: "Gaining real freedom takes work, you know!"
summon: "Everyone wants to have freedom- even me!"
limit_break: "Ah, this makes me remember the good old days."
